Description: EVH WOLFGANG STANDARD Includes: EVH Hard Case (has crack in corner - pictured) D-Tuna installed EVH Strap EVH Picks EVH Strings (2 extra sets) 2018 PRODUCTION NO DENTS or DINGS GUITAR WEIGHT: Approx 7LBS. 5OZ. The most affordable Wolfgang model yet boasts a beautiful basswood body with a flat top and special "comfort cut" forearm contour for max playing ease. Other features include a one-piece bolt-on maple neck with satin finish and graphite reinforcement, smooth and fast compound-radius maple fingerboard (12"-16") with comfortably rolled edges and 22 jumbo frets, dual EVH Wolfgang direct-mount humbucking pickups, two domed black control knobs (master volume, master tone), EVH Floyd Rose® Special bridge and locking nut, and EVH tuners. General Model Name: EVH® Wolfgang® WG Standard Series: Wolfgang Standard Color: Qm Zilla Burst Body: Basswood with Quilt Maple Top Body Shape: Wolfgang® Body Finish: Gloss Polyester Number of Frets: 22 Fret Size: Jumbo Position Inlays: Black Dot Fretboard Radius: 12" to 16" Compound Radius (304.8 mm to 406.4 mm) Fretboard: Maple Neck Material: Bolt-On Maple Neck Finish: Oiled Natural Nut Width: 1.625" (41.3 mm) Scale Length: 25.5" (648 mm) Truss Rod Nut: Heel-Mounted Spoke Wheel Adjustment Pickup Configuration: HH Bridge Pickup: Direct Mount Wolfgang Humbucking Neck Pickup: Direct Mount Wolfgang Humbucking Pickup Switching: 3-Position Toggle: Position 1. Bridge Pickup, Position 2. Bridge and Neck Pickups, Position 3. Neck Pickup Controls: Master Volume, Master Tone Bridge: EVH®-Branded Floyd Rose® Special String Nut: Floyd Rose® R2 Locking Strings: EVH® Branded (.009-.042 Gauges) Unique Features: Unique EVH Wolfgang Body and Headstock Designs, Exposed Basswood to Simulate Natural Wood Binding on Transparent Colors (585), (590), Bar String Retainer, Side-Mounted Rectangular Output Jack Plate, Heel-Mounted Spoke-Wheel Truss Rod Adjustment, Oversized Strap Buttons Control Knobs: Black Plastic
Title: EVH Wolfgang Standard With HSC And Extras
